alert.note: Alert for Chiriaco Summit; Joshua Tree NP West (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 22 at 3:09AM PST until January 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Western portion of Joshua Tree National Park and Chiriaco Summit. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds such as Interstate 10. Light, unsecured objects will become airborne. Moderate tree and minor structural damage possible.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chiriaco Summit; Joshua Tree NP West
